page.title: 14A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ....
page.content: My name is Nicola,I am 8 years old,and I live in Lazenby village.I go to Wilton Primary school.On Tuesday 4th May,I got up at 8:30 and got dressed,I had my breakfast of tea & toast and flakes.I got washed and went to school at 8:50.I played out until 9:00.The teacher took the register,and we had an assembly.Afterwards we read and did some maths.At break I played a game with my friends.Then I read again and watched T.V about France.At 12:00 I had dinner of fishcake, chips and beans,apple sponge and custard.Then I played on the field with my friends.At 1:15 we went in,and I read and painted.At playtime I played with my friends then I did some writing and went home at 3.45.At home I played with my friend Sarah,then I had tea,soup and sandwiches,then played with my friends.Later I went to bed.
